long_description: The MSR Lightning snowshoes flotation tails add extra performance for your Lightning snowshoes, especially in soft snow conditions and when carrying heavy loads. Increases effectiveness in variable conditions by providing an extra 5 in. of length for greater flotation. Easy on/off design for quick changes on the trail. .
short_description: The MSR Lightning snowshoes flotation tails add extra performance for your Lightning snowshoes, especially in soft snow conditions and when carrying heavy loads.
